title: Simple control
Value tracking
source:
const control = new InputControl({
    device: null,
    name: 'axis',
    value: 0
})

control.setValue(0.5)
control.setValue(0.8)

logger.log(control.value)     // 0.8
logger.log(control.oldValue)  // 0.5

control.reset()
logger.log(control.value)     // 0 (default value)
